blogcontent.title: Ways to engage your Champs this Summer
blogcontent.description: Children have a general content and a choice out of three specialized contents (Languages, Art & Technology) to focus...

blogcontent.title: Reasons Extracurricular Activities should be Embraced for Children
blogcontent.description: Children deserve not only exposure to the curriculum of academic learning but also extracurricular experiences that develop them as whole persons in the 21st century. Extracurricular activities are activities done alongside curricular activities.

blogcontent.title: Haven Adventure Board Games
blogcontent.description: With suitable educative games we subtly teach numeracy and literacy. It amazing to watch kids put sounds together to form words and identify count, add and subtract numbers while having fun with peers.

blogcontent.title: How to handle the good news
blogcontent.description: Picture your champ(s) - or a child you love! How best can you engage them this summer?
